meanings.definition: A division of a game in which each team has a turn at bat and in the field.
meanings.sent1: During the inning, the players take turns batting and fielding.
meanings.sent2: In baseball, each team gets a chance to bat and field in an inning.
meanings.sent3: The inning felt like a friendly competition between the two teams.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the inning of the game seemed like a battle of skill and strategy.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the stadium during the inning was palpable.

meanings.definition: A period of time or opportunity for action.
meanings.sent1: She waited for her inning to shine on stage.
meanings.sent2: Everyone deserves their own inning to show what they can do.
meanings.sent3: His inning to impress the boss finally arrived.
meanings.sent4: The new year brought with it a fresh inning for growth and success.
meanings.sent5: Each day is a new inning to make a difference in the world.
